task.title: Peanut Butter Toast and Fruit
task.shortdesc: This recipe is for a quick and easy breakfast of toasted bread with delicious fruit.

taskbody.prereq:
Tasty Toast
You will need the following ingredients:
1 slice of whole grain bread (gluten-free if needed)
½ tablespoons of peanut butter
fruit toppings of choice: banana slices, strawberries, sliced apples, etc.
taskbody.context: This recipe is adapted from Eating Bird Food's Peanut Butter Breakfast Toast article.

step.cmd: Spread on the peanut butter in even strokes
Sprinkle on your choice of fruit toppings—For non-vegans, consider drizzling honey over the peanut butter toast for a burst of flavor
